Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.WindowController
      • it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardListener, ClientListener, MatchListener, PlayerListener, QuestionMessageReceivedListener, NotificationListener, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener
    public class GameController
extends WindowController
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, QuestionMessageReceivedListener, PlayerListener, BoardListener, MatchListener, NotificationListener, ClientListener
    Main class controlling the graphical interface during a match
    Author:
    Adriana Ferrari

        onLoginSuccess in interface ClientListener
        Parameters:
        e - the event
